Articles.Content: If I start the update, it either pauses immediately or times out. Steam responded with a form letter to deactivate my antivirus (don't have any), delete my appcache folder (comes right back) and restart my computer (no effect). I'm on the verge of repurchasing the game from KSP.com, and was wondering if it were possible for Squad to allow me to dl it from their site without having to pay again?

I suspect that the Steam server is under very heavy load right now from the large number of users trying to download 1.0 all at the same time. You might wish to wait it out for a couple of days before trying again later.
